reviewText: It was perfect. I gave it as gift. Was well received.

EXPLICIT HARDCORE saw this movie way back in its original theatrical showing ON A BIG SCREEN when XXX theatres existed in Chicago!! It was a great time when porn movies tried to have a story & acting by the leads and of course handsome manly Sonny Landham does the dirty deeds!!!!

Barbara Bourbon is an elegant woman who seems, at first glance, very reserved. However its performance is the opposite of that appearance. What a shame that the most demontrative scene happens often in the half-light.
Very good quality picture.  Arrived a few days after I ordered it.  Sensual and erotic "old school."

Can this be true?  $75.00 ?  For a movie?  Are you people for real? !  I am a Sonny Landham FAN!  But no movie is worth $75.00!!!  I realy can't belive people have payed this high a price for a movie from the 70's!  Get Real!!!
